definition: to apply (paint etc)/to smear/to daub/to blot out/to scribble/to scrawl/(literary) mud/street
to spread/to lay out/to apply (powder, ointment etc)/sufficient (to cover)/enough

sentences.english: Avoid flux on areas not cleaned.
sentences.chinese: 避免在未塗敷的地方塗敷焊劑。

sentences.english: Avoid flux on areas not cleaned.
sentences.chinese: 避免在未塗敷的地方塗敷焊劑。

sentences.english: The resistors are coated to prevent water films from forming on the surface.
sentences.chinese: 電阻器經過表面塗敷，以避免在其表面形成水膜。

sentences.english: This coating is applied under rigorous preparation and application standards.
sentences.chinese: 這種塗層是在嚴格的預備和應用標準下進行塗敷的。

sentences.english: Following re-preparation, additional coating shall then be applied until the correct DFT is achieved.
sentences.chinese: 再次處理後，應塗敷額外塗層直到達到正確幹膜厚度。

sentences.english: Commodities cream coated with the effect of maintenance, and direct use is the same.
sentences.chinese: 塗敷乳霜與保養品的後果，和直接服用是雷同的。

sentences.english: All areas which are not to be coated shall be protected from abrasive blast cleaning.
sentences.chinese: 應保護好所有不準備塗敷的區域不進行噴砂處理。

sentences.english: Brush apply paint to small areas.
sentences.chinese: 用刷子塗敷油漆到小的區域。

sentences.english: Aluminum oxide wear-resistant layers after gum dipping are coated with lacquer paintings.
sentences.chinese: 在浸膠後的三氧化二鋁耐磨層上塗敷漆面。

sentences.english: The superficial grain noise of coating layer on battery electrodes is bad.
sentences.chinese: 極片塗敷層表面顆粒噪聲較強。

sentences.english: Coating equipment shall comply with the coating manufacturer's recommendation.
sentences.chinese: 塗敷設備應遵照塗敷廠商的建議。

sentences.english: Coating equipment shall comply with the coating manufacturer's recommendation.
sentences.chinese: 塗敷設備應遵照塗敷廠商的建議。

sentences.english: Apply a second coat to both the fitting socket and the pipe.
sentences.chinese: 在管件承插部位和管道上再塗敷第二層。

sentences.english: The bearing shall be manufactured from PTFE- coated bronze centered on steel.
sentences.chinese: 軸承應該由聚四氟乙烯塗敷的中心爲青銅的鋼製造。

sentences.english: The contractor shall handle the coating equipment and materials in accordance with the manufacturer's recommendations.
sentences.chinese: 承包方應根據廠家的建議來搬運塗敷設備。

sentences.english: Wet film thickness gauges may be used during coating to ensure correct coating thickness.
sentences.chinese: 在塗敷時應採用溼膜測厚儀以確定準確的塗層厚度。
